title: CSV Content Analyzer
description: Upload any CSV file and get an AI-powered analysis of what the data represents, including column interpretations and content summary

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Drag-and-drop CSV upload with manual analysis trigger and instant AI analysis results

interactions: User drops or selects CSV → parse with Papa Parse → enable Analyze button
User clicks Analyze → sample first 20 rows → call window.geaRuntimeLLM with JSON of columns and sample data → display AI guess of dataset purpose and column meanings
Store last 5 analyses in localStorage for quick re-view
acceptance_criteria: Accepts any CSV regardless of headers or structure
Analyze button only enabled after file selection
Shows AI summary within 3 seconds of clicking Analyze
Handles parsing errors gracefully with clear message
